folder.name: 50 tables with 30 full load and 20 incremental load

activities.name: log_TBL
activities.description:
drop table [dbo].[ETLLog]

create table [dbo].[ETLLog]
(

TableName varchar(255),
WatermarkValue datetime,
Status varchar(32)
);

INSERT INTO [dbo].[ETLLog]
VALUES ('data_source_table','1/1/2010 12:00:00 AM','Success')

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[ETLLog]

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(WatermarkValue) as Logtime from [dbo].[ETLLog] WHERE Status='Success';

activities.name: IncrementalCopyActivity
activities.description:
drop table [dbo].[data_source_table];

create table [dbo].[data_source_table]
(
    PersonID int,
    Name varchar(255),
    LastModifytime datetime
);

INSERT INTO [dbo].[data_source_table]
    (PersonID, Name, LastModifytime)
VALUES
    (1, 'aaaa','9/1/2021 12:56:00 AM'),
    (2, 'bbbb','9/2/2018 5:23:00 AM'),
    (3, 'cccc','9/3/2021 2:36:00 AM'),
    (4, 'dddd','9/4/2020 3:21:00 AM'),
    (5, 'eeee','9/5/2022 8:06:00 AM');

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[data_source_table]

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
FROM [dbo].[data_source_table]
WHERE LastModifytime > '@{activity('log_TBL').output.firstRow.Logtime}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('source_TBL').output.firstRow.L_S_time}'

activities.name: Stored procedure1
activities.description:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_ETLLog]( @TableName varchar(50), @WatermarkValue datetime, @Status varchar(32) )
AS
BEGIN
INSERT INTO [dbo].[ETLLog]( TableName, WatermarkValue, Status)
SELECT @TableName, @WatermarkValue, @Status
END

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM dbo.Master_child_control_tbl WHERE Master_PPL_Name = 'MasterPPL001' AND Child_PPL_Name = 'ChildPPL001' AND Recovery=1;

UPDATE dbo.Master_child_control_tbl SET Recovery=0 WHERE Master_PPL_Name = 'MasterPPL001' AND Child_PPL_Name = 'ChildPPL001';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM dbo.Master_child_control_tbl WHERE Master_PPL_Name = 'MasterPPL001' AND Child_PPL_Name = 'ChildPPL002' AND Recovery=1;

UPDATE dbo.Master_child_control_tbl SET Recovery=0 WHERE Master_PPL_Name = 'MasterPPL001' AND Child_PPL_Name = 'ChildPPL002';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM dbo.Master_child_control_tbl WHERE Master_PPL_Name = 'MasterPPL001' AND Child_PPL_Name = 'ChildPPL003' AND Recovery=1;

UPDATE dbo.Master_child_control_tbl SET Recovery=1 WHERE Master_PPL_Name = 'MasterPPL001';
SELECT 'SUCCESS' AS STATUS
SELECT * FROM dbo.Control_Tbl_Info where SourceType = 'ASQL' AND ActiveStatus= 1;

UPDATE dbo.Control_Tbl_Info SET ActiveStatus=1;

SELECT 'SUCCESS' AS STATUS;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
MERGE dbo.EMP_TGT TGT USING dbo.EMP_SRC SRC ON (SRC.ID=TGT.ID) 
WHEN MATCHED AND TGT.SAL <> SRC.SAL THEN UPDATE SET TGT.SAL = SRC.SAL
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ID, Ename, SAL) VALUES(SRC.ID, SRC.Ename, SRC.SAL)
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY SOURCE THEN DELETE;

database.defaultValue: SELECT name FROM sys.databases WHERE database_id > 4;

database epplanation.defaultValue: This query retrieves the names of all databases from the sys.databases system view where database_id is greater than 4, which excludes system databases like master, tempdb, model, and msdb.

table.defaultValue: SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE';

sqlReaderQuery.value:
UPDATE [dbo].[control_table1] SET status='sucess' WHERE TableName = '@{item().TableName}';
SELECT 'SUCCESS' AS STATUS

source.sqlReaderQuery:
UPDATE [dbo].[control_table1] SET status='fail' ;
SELECT 'SUCCESS' AS STATUS
